content.en: DNA Methylation Analysis: Scientists have developed a range of algorithms to analyze DNA methylation, a process that can regulate gene expression. These algorithms, such as COHCAP, FadE, and M&M, integrate different types of data to accurately detect methylation patterns and identify regions that are differentially methylated. They provide a cost-effective alternative to whole-genome bisulfite sequencing and improve the speed, accuracy, and statistical power of analyzing DNA methylation data.
content.da: DNA Methylationsanalyse: Forskere har udviklet en række algoritmer til at analysere DNA-methylering, en proces der kan regulere genekspression. Disse algoritmer, såsom COHCAP, FadE og M&M, integrerer forskellige typer data for nøjagtigt at detektere methylationsmønstre og identificere regioner, der er differentielt methylerede. De tilbyder et omkostningseffektivt alternativ til helgenom bisulfitsekventering og forbedrer hastigheden, nøjagtigheden og den statistiske styrke i analysen af DNA-methyleringsdata.
